content.question: Which of the following provides the most accurate explanation of how consumer-driven media increases partisan polarization?

choices.label: Consumer-driven media tends to avoid discussing controversial political topics.
Consumer-driven media reinforces existing political biases in individuals.
Consumer-driven media relies heavily on corporate advertising.

content.answer: Consumer-driven media reinforces existing political biases in individuals.
